Per WiGLE and the manual, the default SSIDs are probably:
''Gateway 7001 AP Internal Network'' and ''Gateway 7001 AP Guest Network''. :The OUI for these SSIDs is 00:E0:B8. ==Links of Interest== [http://support.gateway.com/s/Manuals/servers/8510029.pdf User guide] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== {{DDWRT |techdata = |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = v24 RC5 - kernel support only |current_supported_version = ? |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|notrecommended}} {{OpenWrtNotice|insufficient}} {{OpenWrtNotice|endsupport|2022|19.07.10}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/gateway/gateway_7001 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/gateway/7001 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ixp4xx |subtarget = generic |arch = armeb_xscale |support_started_version = 7.06 |current_supported_version = 18.06.9 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==Pictures==
